Articles.Content: Hello there fellow kerbonauts! I've been playing KSP for a while, and I just decided to join the community to share explosions and crash landings with other space travelers, so HI! My name is Funke, I enjoy building things with many unnecessary but interesting parts, cool looking stuff that might even be able to take off! I only use stock parts though. Anyways, I'll be around posting my explosions and stuff, see ya!
Hello we all love explosions here at the forums:)
Moar booster=Moar boom! Please don't blow up the servers
Hi! Hope you have spectacular explosions.
